title: DatabaseConfig
description: A configuration file for databases used in projects

ProjectRootPath.description: The root path of the project's SQL files, following the required structure

ProceduresBeforeFunctions.description: Whether to create procedures before functions. Used to swap the order if some functions use procedures

ServerName.description: The server name for this environment. Can be something like `localhost\SQLEXPRESS` or an IP with port like `192.168.1.1,1433`

DatabaseName.description: The database name for this environment

Login.description: The SQL Server Authentication login for this environment, used for connecting to the database

Password.description: The SQL Server Authentication password for this environment, used for connecting to the database

CreateDatabaseLogin.description: An optional database login to create for this environment

CreateDatabaseLoginPassword.description: An optional password to create for the new login of this environment

CreateDatabaseUserName.description: An optional database user to create for the login of this environment
